Package models

Class Student

java.lang.Object
models.User
models.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseConnector
public class Student extends User implements DatabaseConnector
The Student class represents a student in the system. It extends the User class and provides methods to manage the list of students. It also has methods to retrieve and update information about the students from the database.
Since:
2023-04-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
Timothy Lee, Justin Wong, Jun Hao, Lee Cheng Yao, Abhishekh

    • Student

      public Student(String studentId, String studentEmail, String studentPassword, String studentName, int projectID)
      Creates a new Student object with the given attributes, and adds it to the list of students.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      studentEmail - The email address of the student.
      studentPassword - The password of the student.
      studentName - The name of the student.
      projectID - The ID of the project that the student is assigned to.
